attributes.action: stop MPs claiming for stuff we all have to pay for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Home Secretary seems to think it is OK to claim for her internet access bill.
We all have to do this
Why should an MP be able to claim it on expenses, quite apart from the movies her husband seems to want to watch?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
